lines.text: Charlie, about that bullet?
You can keep secret?
Of course!
So can I.
I bought a crownless hat, and a backless dress, and some toeless shoes.
Stores have no clothes which are complete?
You know, after being here, I could have an elegant time in a cemetary reading tombstones at midnight.
Shady business do not make for sunny life.
Your suicide most excellent case of murder.
Oh-oh! What is your pop gonna say?
I don't know, but I sure need Pop.
I need Pop, too. I mean, your pop.
Will you two stop poppin' and get goin'?
Who do you think killed Mr. Bonner?
Spooks.
Silly, they can't hurt anyone.
No? But how come they're scarin' me to death?
Very low spirits in Bonner seances. All come from basement.
You know, Pop, I got an idea about this Bonner case.
Water on brain now leaking, huh?
Now sit on your blood pressure and keep it down.
Your spirits are a long time coming, Mr. Chan.
Spirits always have very long way to come.
